changelog: Flame Mammoth - Sub Tank: No longer requires charged Chameleon Sting (possible copypaste error from Heart Tank rules?)
Flame Mammoth - Heart Tank: Added yellow logic for charged Shotgun Ice with ice logic enabled
Storm Eagle - Heart Tank: Added yellow logic for charged Shotgun Ice with ice logic enabled
Storm Eagle - Helmet Capsule: Added yellow logic for a pixel perfect wall jump
Boomer Kuwanger - Heart Tank: Added yellow logic for a pixel perfect wall jump
Sigma Fortress 3 - HP Pickup 1: Separated logic so that it requires either Legs or Boomerang Cutter, not both
Sigma Fortress 3 - 1up Pickup on Spikes: Made so it only shows up in logic with ice logic enabled
Added Helmet checkpoint logic
Added Hadouken boss damage logic
Sigma Stages Open as Group is now clickable
Added Armored Armadillo HP pickups yellow logic
Fixed bug detecting dash lemon weakness
Added additional optional legs upgrade
Fixed missing Thunder Slimer weakness check
Version 1.0 because all game logic is now tracked and therefore should be feature complete for now
Reworked boss weaknesses. Weaknesses are now detected and used for logic calculations, with vanilla weaknesses as a fallback if not autotracking
Bosses that can be reached and damaged but not required by logic are shown in yellow
Added yellow logic for hadouken on Chill Penguin domes
Added game-themed map icons to replace the default chest location marker
Combined various close map items for a cleaner look, Changed arms/jammed buster to function the same as the X3 tracker, Fixed bug in armor upgrades count calculation, Added 'yellow' logic for bosses
Added tab auto switching, requires Mega Man X AP v1.0.2
Added stage maps
Support v1.0.0 logic, improved documentation, added autoupdate
Initial release
